bandaranayakaminuwangoda samawinisuru abhidharmacharya ee. ee. piyarathna mahatha wisin sama purapasaloswaka pohoya dinakama pawathwagena enu labana “ widarshana bhawana ha deshana” wadasatahan malawa mema agosthu 31 weni adhi binara pasaloswaka dina pahatha sandahan wiharasthanayanhidi pawathwenu atha.perawaru 8. 30 sita 10. 30 dakwa minuwangoda, madamulla shri saugatharamaya wiharasthanayedi weragoda shobhitha nahimige anushasakathwayenda paswaru 12. 30 sita 2. 30 dakwa aandiambalama, walpola, chethiyaramaya wiharasthanayedi kimbaulapitiya saddhananda nahimige anushasakathwayenda paswaru 3. 00 sita 5. 00 dakwa minuwangoda, kalawana, hasthiwanaramaya, wiharasthanayedi hunumulle dhammakiththi nahimiyange anushasakathwayenda pawathwe.-

rohaledi miyagiya siya birindage mala sirura niwasata gena yama sandaha wahanayak sapaya ganimata wathkamak nothibunu samiyeku wisin ema mala sirura urahisa matha thabagena niwasa wetha gaman kala puwathak nagenahira indiyawe orissa pranthayen wartha we.orissawe, kalahandi rajaye disthi්rak rohaledi eeye aluyama dana majige birinda amange jiwithakshayata path wi thibuni.42 hawiridi amange miya gos thibune kshaya rogaya walandimeni.miya giya birindage sirura rohale sita kilo mitar 60k pamana durin pihiti siya niwasata ragena yama sandaha gilan rathayak dana maji wisin rohal baladharingen illum kara thibuni.namuth rohal baladharin wisin ohuge illimata prathichara dakwa nomatha.itha duppath pudgalayeku wunu dana majita birindage mala sirura gamata gena yama sandaha kuli padanama matha wahanayak laba ganimata mudal nothibuni.pasuwa dana maji wisin birindage mala sirura rediwalin otha urahisa mathin gena rohale sita niwasa bala pa gamanin gaman kara atha.ohu samanga ohuge 12 hawiridi diyaniyada gaman kara thibe.mema puwatha orissawe rupawahini nalikawak mangin pracharaya kirimen pasuwa prantha saukhya sewawa idiripath wi dana majita birindage mala sirura ohuge niwasata gena yama sandaha awashya gilan ratha pahasukam ha awamangalyadhara sapaya atha.ee wana wita dana maji birindage mala sirura osawagena pa gamanin kilomitar 12k pamana gaman kara thibuni.pasugiya pebarawari masayedi orissa prantha rajaya wisin rohalwala sita mala siruru nomile prawahanaya kirima sandaha gilan ratha sewawak aarambha kara athi athara ee sandaha awashya gilan ratha 37k rohalwalata laba di thibiyadi mewani thaththwayak uda wima gana prantha saukhya amathiwaraya wisin pradeshiya baladharingen karunu wimasa thibe.nagenahira indiyawe pihiti orissa pranthaya erata antha darida්rathawayen pelena pranthawalin ekaki.
